|cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58BVG0S3HTA00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GC16EWXD-12H |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, J5 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J14 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4352;BCM4352KMLG, TE1512 P20, 463276-22 3 W: |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, HD1511 P10, 455762 1 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;2;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;SKY85405, 441EJ, 1441 MY;2; |tp_firmware=FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=48:F8:B3 }} {{TagLine|AC1200+ Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA6350/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA6350|pid=01t80000003cgXOAAY}} "P/N: 141'''9116'''20013J REV:08", "RoHS", and the new '''Linksys''' logo :appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{WiFiCert|WFA62026|12/15/2015}} ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial port named "J14 connector" is at the left of the processor’s heat diffuser. :The 3.3V pin is marked by a little white arrow in front of the most left pin. :Next is TX pin and next is RX pin and finally GND is the most right pin. 
VCC  TX RX  GND
 o   o   o   o
 ^
